name: The Marvelous Adventures of Bonny & George
name_original: The Marvelous Adventures of Bonny & George
description:
Welcome to the Marvelous adventures of Bonny and George, a 2D side scrolling game set in an old style cartoon world. Join the adventure as Bonny and George navigate through four retro levels dodging ghosts and anvils that are coming to get them!

Will you be able to help them make it to the end, or will you fail in your journey?

We’ll never know unless you try!
